local.friendlyName.label: Friendly Name
local.friendlyName.description: A user-readable name for the tag

battery.logEnable.label: Enable Battery Log
battery.logEnable.description: Whether or not to log the current battery level

gps.logTTFFEnable.label: Enable TTFF Log
gps.logTTFFEnable.description: Enable logging time to first fix

gps.maximumAquisitionTime.label: GPS On
gps.maximumAquisitionTime.description: Maximum amount of time in seconds that the GPS will remain on

gps.scheduledAquisitionInterval.label: GPS Sleep
gps.scheduledAquisitionInterval.description: Period of time in seconds to wait between trying to aquire fixes (i.e 60 means wait 60 seconds)

gps.mode.label: GPS Mode
gps.mode.description: GPS can be triggered in one of two ways. 1) Scheduled - GPS set to come on for a fixed interval to obtain a fix and then sleeps for a fixed interval. 2) Switch triggered - GPS set to take a fix when the salt water switch is triggered.

gps.testFixHoldTime.label: Test Fix Hold Time
gps.testFixHoldTime.description: Maximum amount of time in seconds to Test Fix Hold Time

rtc.label: RTC
rtc.description: Real time clock. Displays the time of the device e.g. 'Wed, 21 Feb 2018 16:17:13 GMT'

rtc.dateTime.label: Date Time
rtc.dateTime.description: Accepts any reasonable time string e.g. 'Wed, 21 Feb 2018 16:17:13 GMT'

saltwaterSwitch.logEnable.label: Saltwater Switch Log Enable
saltwaterSwitch.logEnable.description: Log enable/disable of saltwater switch submerged and surfaced event transitions

saltwaterSwitch.hysteresisPeriod.label: Hysteresis Period
saltwaterSwitch.hysteresisPeriod.description: Time in seconds to wait before a trigger is registered (i.e prevents constant triggering within the defined time set)

bluetooth.logEnable.label: Enable Bluetooth Log
bluetooth.logEnable.description: Enable/disable logging of BLUETOOTH_xxx log messages

system.label: Device Name
system.description: The device name is retrieved from the tag and displayed here

system.deviceName.label: The device name
system.deviceName.description: A unique name for the device
